metadata.title: CVE-2024-0742 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: It was possible for certain browser prompts and dialogs to be activated ordismissed unintentionally by the user due to an incorrect timestamp used toprevent input after page load. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 122,Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
